mcciutils.config.enableDiscordStatus.lin: Toggles the Discord Status on and off.
You will need to switch lobbies for status to update.
mcciutils.config.customDetails.line2: USERNAME: Shows the username of the player
mcciutils.config.customDetails.line3: MODVERSION: Shows the version of the mod
mcciutils.config.customDetails.line4: You will need to switch lobbies for status to update.
